feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.4
entry.content:
Resolves:

https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/398 about log spam and did some additional stuff

  • If users put a / at the end of the url or any special characters, a script removes it and saves the proper address to prevent issues (usually with sonarr)

  • moved to debug (the 30 second intervals)

  • moved to debug (was spamming in info constantly, but if there is an error, it will show in info)

  • removed this from initial load up since it didn't work an not needed

Fixed issue of the information icon display - removed from mobile and desktop view

What's Changed

  • Fix011 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/408
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/409

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.3...6.4.4

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.5
entry.content:
Fixes major bug with state management. Even though it was coded, it did not run in the background process; thus the state management will never reset (unless you press that emergency button). This fix ensures that background.py runs the reset so your stuff can start processing again.

https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/407 - GITHUB Issue

Also a new scheduling tab is added, but. not working yet (noted with a warning under development)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.6
entry.content:
• Just getting more feedback for scheduler. Does not execute yet. Tracking scrolling down in desktop mode is an issue for that page only.

What's Changed

  • Fix011 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/408 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.3...6.4.6

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.7
entry.content:
Apps now have their own API control settings, no more universal setting. By default, each app will be at 20... so make sure you update each app for the numbers you would like. Note a new scheduler section is added; it doesn't execute yet but play with it and provide some feedback. You'll be able to add resume, pause and API speed limits on your schedule (per app)!

New location for apps

And in the logs it works!

Schedule Demo

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.6...6.4.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.0
entry.content:
Welcome to 6.5.0

  • Scheduling [Enable/Disable] between different apps (or all apps/global) now works (For request: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/359)
  • Scheduling [API Limits] between different apps (or all alpps/global) now works (For request: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/359)
  • Side bar cleaned up for easy navigation view
  • Apps view for desktop; scrolling too far down no longer causes going into a large blank area (contained)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.7...6.5.0
